title: Bump actix-http from 0.2.9 to 0.2.10

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [actix-http](https://github.com/actix/actix-web) from 0.2.9 to 0.2.10.
Release notes *Sourced from [actix-http's releases](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/releases).* > ## Actix http v0.2.10 > ## Changes > > ### Added > > * Add support for sending HTTP requests with `Rc` in addition to sending HTTP requests with `RequestHead` > > ### Fixed > > * on_connect result isn't added to request extensions for http2 requests [#1009](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/1009)
Commits - [`043f763`](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/commit/043f763c51675b0d4bc0d8a66e8a6883e155bdd8) prepare actix-http release - [`8873e9b`](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/commit/8873e9b39ed776249e756195e46a5f295760146c) Added FrozenClientRequest for easier retrying HTTP calls ([#1064](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/1064)) - [`5e8f1c3`](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/commit/5e8f1c338c2a45544359d03ce6ea5a3b0c0a3cfb) fix h2 not using error response ([#1080](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/1080)) - [`1d96ae9`](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/commit/1d96ae9bc372a9bb857cdb105fc89314e4ddc6c8) actix-multipart: Correctly parse multipart body which does not end in CRLF (#... - [`8d61fe0`](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/commit/8d61fe09257a2439a00c737728f6a26a5111c1cb) Ensure that awc::ws::WebsocketsRequest sets the Host header ([#1070](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/1070)) - [`8a9fcdd`](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/commit/8a9fcddb3cad417bba5119111e044bb6ff11771d) Condition middleware ([#1075](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/1075)) - [`c940045`](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/commit/c9400456f665fb30d61031289570aafae01b1b61) update actix-connect ver - [`63ddd30`](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/commit/63ddd30ee44c710721b53c4d349c5d65655f217e) on_connect result isnt added to request extensions for http2 requests [#1009](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/1009) - [`bae2989`](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/commit/bae29897d695f70860ab0134fea1f88180560bae) prep actix-web release - [`616981e`](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/commit/616981ecf9a5be5de467f9d9753ca47aa44c9d21) clear extensions before reclaiming HttpRequests in their pool ([#1063](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/1063)) - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/compare/http-v0.2.9...http-v0.2.10)

title: Bump actix-web from 1.0.5 to 1.0.7

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [actix-web](https://github.com/actix/actix-web) from 1.0.5 to 1.0.7.
Release notes *Sourced from [actix-web's releases](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/releases).* > ## Actix web v1.0.7 > ## Changes > > ### Fixed > > * Request Extensions leak [#1062](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/1062) > > ## Actix web v1.0.6 > ## Changes > > ### Added > > * Re-implement Host predicate ([#989](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/989)) > > * Form implements Responder, returning a `application/x-www-form-urlencoded` response > > * Add `into_inner` to `Data` > > * Add `TestRequest::set_form()` convenience method to automatically serialize data and set > the header in test requests. > > ### Changed > > * `Query` payload made `pub`. Allows user to pattern-match the payload. > > * Enable `rust-tls` feature for client [#1045](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/1045) > > * Update serde_urlencoded to 0.6.1 > > * Update url to 2.1
Changelog *Sourced from [actix-web's changelog](https://github.com/actix/actix-web/blob/master/CHANGES.md).* > ## [1.0.7] - 2019-08-29 > > ### Fixed > > * Request Extensions leak [#1062](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/1062) > > > ## [1.0.6] - 2019-08-28 > > ### Added > > * Re-implement Host predicate ([#989](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/989)) > > * Form immplements Responder, returning a `application/x-www-form-urlencoded` response > > * Add `into_inner` to `Data` > > * Add `test::TestRequest::set_form()` convenience method to automatically serialize data and set > the header in test requests. > > ### Changed > > * `Query` payload made `pub`. Allows user to pattern-match the payload. > > * Enable `rust-tls` feature for client [#1045](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/1045) > > * Update serde_urlencoded to 0.6.1 > > * Update url to 2.1

[#680](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/680) > > * Do not remove `Content-Length` on `Body::Empty` and insert zero value if it is missing for `POST` and `PUT` methods. > > * Fix preflight CORS header compliance; refactor previous patch ([#603](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/603)). [#717](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/717) > > * Fix never-ending HTTP2 request when response is empty ([#709](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/709)). [#540](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/actix/actix-web/issues/540) > > * Add support for PATCH HTTP method > > ### Fixed > > * Ignored the `If-Modified-Since` if `If-None-Match` is specified.
